SQLStringContainer.MailTemplete.InsertAtt: INSERT INTO MCMAILTEMPLETEATTACHMENT(ATTACHMENTID, ATTACHMENTNAME, CONTENTTYPE, ATTACHMENTBODY, TEMPLETEID) VALUES(@ATTACHMENTID, @ATTACHMENTNAME, @CONTENTTYPE, @ATTACHMENTBODY, @TEMPLETEID)
SQLStringContainer.Mail.InsertAtt: INSERT INTO MCMAILATTACHMENT(ATTACHMENTID, ATTACHMENTNAME, ATTACHMENTBODY, CONTENTTYPE, MAILID) VALUES(@ATTACHMENTID, @ATTACHMENTNAME, @ATTACHMENTBODY, @CONTENTTYPE, @MAILID)
SQLStringContainer.Mail.Insert: INSERT INTO MCMAIL(MAILID, MAILTO, CC, BCC, SUBJECT,FORMATTYPE,PRIORITY,BODY) VALUES(@MAILID, @MAILTO, @CC, @BCC, @SUBJECT, @FORMATTYPE, @PRIORITY, @BODY)
SQLStringContainer.MailTemplete.UpdateBody: UPDATE MCMAILTEMPLETEBODY SET BODY = @BODY where TEMPLETEID = @TEMPLETEID
